channel.title: CVE Feed for RegistrationMagic -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RegistrationMagic -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47645|2024-08-02T21:16:43.237Z -- registrationmagic -- registrationmagic%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20registration%20forms%2C%20user%20registration%2C%20payment%2C%20and%20user%20login
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in RegistrationMagic RegistrationMagic – Custom Registration Forms, User Registration, Payment, and User Login allows Cross Site Request Forgery.This issue affects RegistrationMagic – Custom Registration Forms, User Registration, Payment, and User Login: from n/a through 5.2.2.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-50846|2024-08-02T22:23:43.500Z -- registrationmagic -- registrationmagic%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20registration%20forms%2C%20user%20registration%2C%20payment%2C%20and%20user%20login
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in RegistrationMagic RegistrationMagic – Custom Registration Forms, User Registration, Payment, and User Login.This issue affects RegistrationMagic – Custom Registration Forms, User Registration, Payment, and User Login: from n/a through 5.2.4.5.

item.title: CVE-2023-25991|2024-08-02T11:39:06.369Z -- registrationmagic -- registrationmagic
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in RegistrationMagic plugin <= 5.1.9.2 versions.
